bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Polyaxonfile UI editor does not handle yaml validation
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
If the yaml content is wrong or contains bad indentation, the UI does not show the error to the end user. <denchmark-code>An unhandled error was caught from submitForm() {name: "YAMLException", reason: "duplicated mapping key", mark: o, message: "duplicated mapping key </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>To reproduce</denchmark-h>
Provide a polyaxonfile with some bad indentation or duplicate keys, the form will prevent server validation and the error is not correctly handled from the UI. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
Better handling of errors on the UI side in addition to the errors returned from the server. If there's time, this should be included in v1.1.9, otherwise we can move it to 1.2.0. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
All versions.
